rows.description: Google Search & other includes revenues generated on Google search properties, including revenues from traffic generated by search distribution partners who use Google.
products_services: revenues from traffic generated by search
revenues generated on Google search prope

rows.description: YouTube ads revenue consists of advertising revenues generated from YouTube, including brand advertising products and direct response advertising products, both of which benefited from increased advertiser spending.
Google Network revenues are part of Google advertising revenues within Google Services, but the specific components or nature of Google Network are not detailed in the provided chunks.

Google subscriptions, platforms, and devices revenues are comprised of consumer subscriptions (primarily from YouTube services such as YouTube TV, YouTube Music and Premium, NFL Sunday Ticket, and Google One), platforms (primarily revenues from Google Play sales of apps and in-app purchases), devices (sales of the Pixel family of devices), and other products and services.
Google Cloud revenues primarily include revenues from Google Cloud Platform, largely from infrastructure services.

Other Bets is a combination of multiple operating segments that are not individually material, and revenues from Other Bets are generated primarily from the sale of healthcare-related services and internet services.
